channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One of the final messages from the doomed Titan submersible was ‘all good here’
item.description: The Titan imploded in the North Atlantic in June 2023, killing all five people on board and setting off a worldwide debate about the future of private...

item.title: Citigroup says both candidates are negative for stocks, so hope for a split Congress
item.description: Policies proposed by both Harris and Trump could be a deterrent for stocks if fully enacted, according to an analysis by Citigroup.

item.title: Boeing’s credit rating not immediately impacted by strike, says S&P
United Airlines will offer free Wi-Fi after striking deal with Elon Musk’s SpaceX for Starlink service
item.description: Rollout to the entire fleet will take a few years, though.

item.title: Elon Musk deletes X post about Biden, Harris assassination threats after backlash
item.description: Donald Trump and Elon Musk are allies in the Republican's presidential race against Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: The Fed's rate cut could help home buyers solve one of their biggest problems
A Tesla Cybertruck owner had to replace the tires after just 6,000 miles
item.description: And they’re not happy about that.

item.title: Boeing freezes hiring in sweeping cost cuts as it grapples with factory worker strike
item.description: Boeing also said it will pause nonessential staff travel and reduce supplier spending as it deals with a strike of more than 30,000 factory workers.

item.title: Oracle’s stock could pack 30% more upside as these investor worries fade away
America’s national debt is ballooning—and any real solutions can only be bipartisan
item.description: Neither party seems to be seriously addressing a key issue: The national debt.

item.title: Trump Media stock slips after second apparent assassination attempt
item.description: Donald Trump was unharmed after Secret Service agents opened fire on a suspected gunman near the property line of the former president's Florida golf ...

item.title: Student-loan borrowers in their 50s and older plead: We can't die with this debt
Man accused of trying to kill Trump voted for him once then called on Iran to assassinate him
item.description: His over 500 posts on X showed his views ranging from the left to the right, including support for politicians such as Bernie Sanders, Tulsi Gabbard a...

item.title: Apple shares slide as analysts highlight sluggish iPhone 16 demand
item.description: Apple shares slid 3.2% in Monday afternoon trading, after reports that demand for the new iPhone 16 is lower than expected.

item.title: Dow trades in record territory as expectations grow for jumbo rate cut
